summary: This document is a forwarded email from April 5, 2020, containing a link to a Daily Beast article titled 'Jeffrey Epstein's Hollywood Pipeline Ran Straight to Harvey Weinstein'. The email sender shares the article with a recipient, noting it was published five days prior.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Subject of the referenced article about his alleged Hollywood connections.

persons.name: Harvey Weinstein
persons.context: Subject of the referenced article about his alleged connection to Jeffrey Epstein's network.

connections.description: Referenced in the article title as having a 'Hollywood pipeline' running between them.

events.title: Publication of Daily Beast Article
events.description: The Daily Beast published an article titled 'Jeffrey Epstein's Hollywood Pipeline Ran Straight to Harvey Weinstein'.

keyFacts: An article published around March 31, 2020, alleged a connection between Jeffrey Epstein and Harvey Weinstein, described as a 'Hollywood pipeline'.
The document is an email forwarding that article link, dated April 5, 2020.
The email suggests the content was considered noteworthy and was being shared among acquaintances.
